thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1754
thread.title: Catherine

author: Catherine
title: Catherine
text:
Flight Hub was easy to go through the process of booking airline tickets online.
You can choose aisle seat or window seat but later it tells you they just send these details to the airline. There is no guarantee you will get that seat.
They do offer an insurance option but it would have been easier to make a decision, whether or not to get it, if the price (or an estimate of the price) was there. So I declined that option (will get that elsewhere).
You can choose a meal preference (e.g. vegetarian, Kosher, gluten free etc). This works well if you want the same thing for both flights.
The price was good. I will know more after I have taken the flight and see that it all works smoothly - then I'll post again.
I have a print out of my booking - I assume that's all I need when I arrive at the airport. It did not actually tell you this.
